name: Orca Paradise: Wild Friends
description:
Orca Paradise - Wild Friends is the premium gorgeous 3D pet–sim that turns your iOS device into a virtual lagoon. Here, you can feed, train and create a strong bond with realistic looking orcas and dolphins in a beautiful pacific northwest environment. These high-resolution, animated orcas swim and perform tricks across your screen and crave your attention at each step of the game, awaiting your commands. Learn tricks and perform Shows! Share with friends!

GRAPHICS
Amazing 3D graphics replicate actually swimming in a northwest environment with Orcas!

TRICK TRAINING AND ORCA SHOWS
Train orcas to do fun and exciting tricks and then perform in ever bigger and grander dolphin shows!

CARE, NURTURE & PLAY
Take good care of your orcas. Shower them with affection by petting and rubbing their bellies. Keep them healthy with tasty feedings and let them swim, frolic & jump in the paradise lagoon; above and below water!

MINI-GAMES
Help keep the lagoon clean from jellyfish to earn shells and pearls which can be used to buy dolphins, props, decorations and habitats.

PHOTOS
Use our camera system to zoom and pan and take pictures of your dolphins, above or below water. Share exciting pics of your orcas swimming, leaping, jumping and doing tricks via email, Facebook or Twitter.

FRIENDS AND SHARING
Share photos, Orca Show scores and achievements with friends. And coming soon, visit friend’s lagoons!

CUSTOMIZATION
Players can acquire custom props and decorations for Orca Shows and buy multiple dolphin types, eventually caring for many dolphins and orcas.

Orca Paradise is a paid app but contains items that can be purchased with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature please disable in-app purchases.

Install Orca Paradise today!

Orca Paradise is published and developed by HappyGiant

Follow #HappyGiantMedia, #DolphinParadiseApp
